Data stolen using the stolen creds

summary: Incruit, HQ: Seoul, South Korea, NAICS: 541612 (Human Resources Consulting Services), EMP: 162. Oct 22, 2025 The Personal Information Protection Commission (PIPC) imposed a 463 million Korean won (@323MM USD) fine on the online job portal site ‘Incruit’. In Jan 2025, a hacker downloaded malware on a personal information handler’s computer, then used their credentials to gain access to Incruits database. PII was accessed for over 7.27 million members and 54, 475 files totaling 438 MB. Information stolen was name, address, phone number, educational background, career history, military service, and disability status. Despite abnormal database access and large amounts of traffic at the time of the leak, Incruit did not investigate. The company became aware of the leak in March 2024 through an extortion email from the hackers.
